measurements.label: Recoil (Rb; Bloch+AI)
measurements.reference: Bouchendira et al., 'Determination of the fine structure constant with atom interferometry and Bloch oscillations' (arXiv:0812.3139v1)

measurements.label: g-2 (electron; QED)
measurements.reference: Gabrielse et al., 'New Measurement of the Electron Magnetic Moment and the Fine Structure Constant' (arXiv:0801.1134v2)

notes: This treats the electron g-2 based alpha as a reference and maps the discrepancy into an effective recoil epsilon via alpha ‚àù sqrt(h/m).
In reality, discrepancies could also come from systematics or theory inputs; epsilon here is an interpretive parameterization.
